name: Zork
body:
This is a page for my Zork game project. It's a game based in the original Zork that will help me to learn C++ throught his making. This is a project for the UPC university of Barcelona.

![]([img]http://i.imgur.com/0kXvCQu.png?1[/img])
### Link to original Zork: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5zyoqrsugeopel3ffhz_vq/zork
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
